name: Tap Shap - The World's First Multi-platform Reaction Game
name_original: Tap Shap - The World's First Multi-platform Reaction Game
description:
Happy gaming!

Test your motor skills with Tap Shap!

Tap Shap is a unique, free-to-play, addictive game!
Speed the characters through the obstacles while matching their colour patterns. The endless gameplay has one hand control and is good for children to build their motor skills and for older people who could be losing theirs.
Unlock new items from the marketplace, improve your reflexes and compete with people around the world to be the best at this fast-paced game!

How to play:
Tap Shap is an extremely easy-to-play reaction game for all age groups!

- Press the space bar to rotate the ball through each obstacle and match the ball with the coloured obstacles.
- You must follow the colour pattern on each obstacle to cross it.
- If you make the ball pass through the obstacle without coordinating the colours, you will have to start again.
- You can change the objects in your game from the marketplace by using the KIDA CREDITS received during the game.
